EmailTemplate.description: Send email to project leader on project stopping is initiated
EmailTemplate.name: IPM send email when current project is stopped
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Project {!IPM_Project__c.IPM_Project_Name__c} is Stopping
EmailTemplate.textOnly: You have chosen to stop project {!IPM_Project__c.IPM_Project_Name__c} in {!IPM_Project__c.IPM_Phase__c}. You can reverse this decision within 72 hours via the Project Overview Page [{!IPM_Project__c.IPMProjectBaseURL__c}/apex/IPM_ProjectOverview?id={!IPM_Project__c.Id}] before the project is stopped. Once stopped the project cannot be reactivated. The 72 hour period will end on {!IPM_Project__c.IPM_CountDown_Reference_Time__c} expressed as MID(TEXT(IPM_Project__c.IPM_CountDown_Reference_Time__c),12,5) DATAVALUE(IPM_Project__c.IPM_CountDown_Reference_Time__c).
